name: After Party
description:
Made for Ludum Dare #37

Meet Joy, a delightful and cheerful ✝goth✝ girl who unfortunately was rejected an invite to go to a party with all the popular girls in school. NOW IS YOUR CHANCE TO GET YOUR REVENGE ON ALL THE GIRLS WHO HAVE DONE YOU WRONG.

!!✝*Slight NSFW IT's PIXELS BUT YOU KNOW*✝!!

Controls:

WASD = move

Shift = crawling

Mouse 1 or Mouse Left = stab
